name: part_005
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕祭2021】3DLIVE⧸ゲスト大勢！重大告知もりもり！【ホロライブ】 [dVlNi7Pby0w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine and Hololive English Myth (Gawr Gura, Ninomae Ina'nis, Mori Calliope, Takanashi Kiara, Amelia Watson) perform 'Ahoy!! Warera Houshou Kaizokudan☆' in swimsuits on a beach stage.
MC section where Marine talks with the members of Hololive English Myth about their performance and their swimsuit outfits.
Marine addresses the audience, reflecting on the performance with the English branch before introducing the next segment.

subtitles.original: Ahoy!! 宝鐘海賊団、船長の宝鐘マリンです！
subtitles.english: Ahoy!! I'm the captain of the Houshou Pirates, Houshou Marine!

subtitles.original: Ahoy!!
subtitles.english: Ahoy!!

subtitles.original: 全速前進！
subtitles.english: Full speed ahead!

subtitles.original: ヨーソロー！
subtitles.english: Yousoro!

subtitles.original: 出航だー！ 面舵いっぱい！
subtitles.english: Setting sail! Hard-a-starboard!

subtitles.original: 荒波越えて お宝探し
subtitles.english: Crossing the rough waves, searching for treasure

subtitles.original: （水平線の彼方へ！）
subtitles.english: (To the far side of the horizon!)

subtitles.original: 金銀財宝 略奪だー！
subtitles.english: Gold, silver, and jewels... plunder it all!

subtitles.original: （そこのけそこのけ！）
subtitles.english: (Get out of the way, get out of the way!)

subtitles.original: いざ、進め！ どこまでも！
subtitles.english: Now, advance! No matter how far!

subtitles.original: （我ら宝鐘海賊団！）
subtitles.english: (We are the Houshou Pirates!)

subtitles.original: 情熱の嵐 巻き起こせ！
subtitles.english: Kicking up a storm of passion!

subtitles.original: はい！ ということで！
subtitles.english: All right! And so!

subtitles.original: 続いてのゲストは、ホロライブEnglishの皆さんです！
subtitles.english: The next guests are the members of Hololive English!

subtitles.original: Happy Birthday, Marine-senpai!
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday, Marine-senpai!

subtitles.original: わー！ ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Wow! Thank you!

subtitles.original: まさかENのみんなとこの曲を歌えるなんて思わなかった！
subtitles.english: I never thought I'd get to sing this song with everyone from EN!

subtitles.original: みんな、日本まで来てくれて本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you so much for coming all the way to Japan!

subtitles.original: おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: 水着、めちゃくちゃ似合ってるよ！ かわいい！
subtitles.english: The swimsuits look great on you! So cute!

subtitles.original: You look great too, Marine-senpai!
subtitles.english: You look great too, Marine-senpai!

subtitles.original: えー！ 嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Oh! I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: 日本語もすごく上手だったよ！ 練習したの？
subtitles.english: Your Japanese was really good too! Did you practice?

subtitles.original: We practiced a lot for you!
subtitles.english: We practiced a lot for you!

subtitles.original: 最高だね！ 感動しちゃう！
subtitles.english: That's amazing! I'm so moved!

subtitles.original: ぐらちゃん、イナちゃん、カリちゃん、キアラちゃん、アメちゃん！
subtitles.english: Gura-chan, Ina-chan, Calli-chan, Kiara-chan, Ame-chan!

subtitles.original: みんなに会えて本当に嬉しいよ！
subtitles.english: I'm so truly happy to meet you all!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ、ホロライブEnglishのみんなでした！ ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Well then, that was everyone from Hololive English! Thank you!

subtitles.original: Bye-bye! Happy Birthday!
subtitles.english: Bye-bye! Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: バイバイー！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: はい！ ということでね！
subtitles.english: Yes! And so!

subtitles.original: いやー、ENのみんな、可愛かったですね！
subtitles.english: Man, the EN members were so cute!

subtitles.original: 水着姿で一緒に踊れて、船長はもう感無量です！
subtitles.english: Being able to dance together in swimsuits, I'm just overwhelmed with emotion!

subtitles.original: さてさて、生誕祭ライブ、まだまだ盛り上がっていきますよ！
subtitles.english: Now then, the birthday live is going to keep heating up!

subtitles.original: 続いてのゲストはこの方々です！ どうぞ！
subtitles.english: The next guests are these people! Here they are!
